channel.title: Tony Locke - The Common Sense Eccentric

item.title: " * Ending agricultural subsidies * Legal...
item.description:
" * Ending agricultural subsidies
* Legalizing prostitution
* Legalizing drugs.
* Abolishing the national minimum wage.
* Freeing up trade by ending protectionism."

Thing is, you've not said how these factors relate to food prices...
item.dc:creator: The Common Sense Eccentric
